Articles.Content: I was just editing some settings, and this happens

Ummm... well, whatever it is, it's not supposed to happen.... Are you stock?

EDIT: Analyzing what its supposed to be... If it is stock, I can only imagine that it is a Ruggedized Wheel... its the only thing it looks like!

Edited June 23, 2014 by Random Tank

Well,,,, how do you think he got there?

(what settings did you change?)
It is all stock, and I just changed graphical settings. After further analysis, the whole new file is corrupt. Considering that the Cupola module is the habitation module
You fools! You've messed with the natural order!

I propose you mess with it further. For science.

(Back up stuff if you haven't.)
You know all the opening screen shots are taken on a sound stage in the basement of KSC, right?
Proof that the Kerbal Mun landing is a hoax?

Bad camera work there.

Not convincing at all.
The local Monolith is actually a Transformer.

Well, lets see if others can reproduce it

Step one - Reinstall KSP.

Step Two - Change max persistent debris to Unlimited

Step Three - In Graphics, Set everything to the right. EVERYTHING

Step Four - Hit Apply

Step Five - Hit accept

Step six - See if it happened

Congraulations! You (may) have reproduced this! Prize - The buggy game
Everything?! That explains it--your comp couldn't handle it, and broke!
